column1: EVTDESCmoduscarolimagni.1063;The King of the West Franks has dealt with Viking raids for decades
column2: many of which have threatened the city of Paris itself. Some say that on one occassion when the Vikings attacked Paris
column3: the Seine was so filled with longships that one could walk from one side to the other without falling into the water. In an effort to prevent another devastating raid
column4: the King has decided to grant a Viking warlord named Rollo lands at the mouth of the Seine in exchange for his conversion to Christianity and a promise to defend Paris from his Viking kin. However
column5: rumour says that the king was humiliated by his new "vassal" during the ceremony of homage.;
